Package index

All functions

arrange_score()
Arrange score result score_res
attach_score()
Attach score result score_res to score object score_obj containig metadata
bind_scores()
Bind all metadata score_obj and score result score_res, and assign class score_set to combined scores.
fill_safe_values()
Fill safe values.
filter_score_auto()
Filter score result score_res based on number or proportion of predictors with optional cutoff value
filter_score_cutoff()
Filter score result score_res based on cutoff value
filter_score_num()
Filter score result score_res based on number of predictors
filter_score_prop()
Filter score result score_res based on proportion of predictors
get_scores_aov()
Compute F-statistic and p-value scores using ANOVA F-test
get_scores_cor()
Compute Pearson or Spearman correlation coefficients
get_scores_cross_tab()
Compute cross tabulation p-value scores using Fisher’s exact test and the chi-squared test
get_scores_forest_importance()
Compute feature importance scores using a random forest, a conditional random forest, or an oblique random forest
get_scores_info_gain()
Compute information gain
get_scores_roc_auc()
Compute area under the Receiver Operating Characteristic curve (ROC AUC)
new_score_obj()
Construct a new score object
rank_score_dense()
Rank score result score_res based on dense_rank (Need a better title)
rank_score_min()
Rank score result score_res based on min_rank (Need a better title)
score_aov()
Create a score object for ANOVA F-test F-statistics and p-values
score_cor()
Create a score object for correlation coefficients
score_cross_tab()
Create a score object for cross tabulation p-values
score_forest_imp()
Create a score object for feature importance scores
score_info_gain()
Create a score object for information gain
score_roc_auc()
Create a score object for area under the Receiver Operating Characteristic curve (ROC AUC)
trans_score()
Transform score result score_res
transform_abs
Absolute Transformation
transform_neg_log10
Negative log10 Transformation TODO Rewrite using other method
